comment: Says he wants respect while acting  too much like a dictator and forces you to call him Dr. Shaw but is funny at times.

Assigns 3 tests, one is a final. One 7-10 page paper, but margins are 1.5 inches all around so it's more like a 5 page paper. Willing to help. Responds to emails and talking to him after class. Treated students like adults, expected the same treatment in return.
Group activities just about every class. 7-10 page research paper. Thought this would be my easiest course but it is more strenuous than my math course.
